article_title: Why Big Data Is Bad for Pop Music and More #Mustreads
article_text:
It’s only Tuesday.

And Re/code is awake, bright-eyed and bushy-tailed, with some fresh content for you to peruse:

If you see any stories you’d like to send our way (or have any questions/comments about stories we’ve recommended), feel free to shoot an email to noah@recode.net.
